original_text: And they that kept them fled, and went their ways into the city, and told every thing, and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils.
korean_text: 치던 자들이 달아나 시내에 들어가 이 모든 일과 귀신 들린 자의 일을 고하니

sentences.original_text: And they that kept them fled
and went their ways into the city
and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils
sentences.korean_translation: 귀신 들린 자에게 일어난 일도 전하니라
